Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 108th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1969...
Injured on 5/18/1969 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/25/1973 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/4/1975, off Chris Hale (GHG)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1977, off Mark Almaraz (DIA)...
Injured on 6/16/1979 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/3/1981 with a Broken Skull, out for 10 weeks...
Released by Pontiac on 4/7/1982...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 2/27/1983 to a 2-year deal worth $570,700 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Lynchburg on 9/29/1983...
